whatWeAre.title: What We Are
whatWeAre.p1: At Social Colab, we believe in fostering direct, transparent, and fruitful relationships. That's why we've built the first-ever 0% commission platform in Mauritius, dedicated to connecting local brands with a vetted community of creators. Our model is simple: you pay for the plan, not the connection. No hidden fees, no percentages of your campaign budget taken away. Just a flat, predictable subscription.
whatWeAre.p2: This approach empowers brands to maximize their marketing spend and allows creators to keep 100% of their earnings from collaborations. It's a win-win that encourages more authentic partnerships and a stronger creative economy for our island.
